item.title: 软银利用美元和欧元债券市场融资 29 亿美元
item.description: 软银集团公司通过发行美元和欧元次级混合债券出售了约 29 亿美元，该公司正在加强全球筹资，以推动对人工智能（包括 OpenAI）的投资。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. sold about $2.9 billion through an offering of subordinated hybrid bonds in dollars and euros as the company steps up global fundraising to fuel investments in artificial intelligence, including OpenAI.】

item.title: 金默里奇称英联邦液化天然气交易将于年底结束
item.description: Kimmeridge 能源管理公司正准备宣布其在路易斯安那州海岸开发的液化天然气出口终端的最终供应交易。【原文：Kimmeridge Energy Management Co. is preparing to announce the final supply deals for the liquefied natural gas export terminal it’s developing on the Louisiana coast.】

item.title: 阿根廷经济在中期选举前略有增长
item.description: 尽管流动性紧缩，阿根廷经济在 8 月份仍实现了月度小幅扩张，在本周末关键的中期选举之前为总统哈维尔-米莱赢得了胜利。【原文：Argentina’s economy posted a slight monthly expansion in August despite a liquidity crunch in a win for President Javier Milei ahead of a critical midterm election this weekend.】

item.title: 美联储失去 ADP 劳工统计数据加剧数据真空
item.description: 美联储不再从独立供应商处接收私营部门就业数据，这使得决策者在联邦政府持续停摆的情况下更加缺乏及时的经济信息。【原文：The Federal Reserve is no longer receiving data on private-sector employment from an independent provider, adding to policymakers’ lack of timely information on the economy amid the ongoing federal government shutdown.】

item.title: 改革派法拉奇推动英国加密货币促销全面改革
item.description: 英国改革派领导人奈杰尔-法拉奇（Nigel Farage）表示，在数字资产行业努力遵守其标准之后，应该放宽对加密货币公司如何向消费者推销自己的规定。【原文：Reform UK leader Nigel Farage said rules governing how crypto companies market themselves to consumers should be slackened, after the digital asset industry has struggled to comply with its standards.】

item.title: 特斯拉第三季度盈利分析
item.description: 一辆特斯拉汽车停在加利福尼亚州瓦莱霍的特斯拉商店里。摄影师：大卫-保罗-莫里斯/布鲁姆伯格【原文：A Tesla vehicle at the company's store in Vallejo, California. Photographer: David Paul Morris/Bloomberg】

item.title: 尽管价格暴跌，黄金发烧友仍坚守本心
item.description: 最近几周，随着黄金一路走高，进入未知领域，就连顽固的黄金爱好者也警告说，黄金的快速反弹已经失控。现在，随着金价暴跌，他们坚信金银的长期牛市尚未结束。【原文：As gold pushed higher and higher into uncharted territory in recent weeks, even die-hard enthusiasts warned that the rapid rally was getting out of hand. Now, with prices plunging, they’re keeping faith that bullion’s longer-term bull market isn’t over yet.】

item.title: 预测市场 Kalshi 以超过 100 亿美元的估值获得投资者青睐
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，预测市场 Kalshi 正在接受风险投资人的融资提议，对这家初创公司的估值将超过 100 亿美元。【原文：Prediction market Kalshi is receiving funding offers from venture capital investors that would value the startup at more than $10 billion, according to people familiar with the matter — interest that comes just weeks after Kalshi announced a $300 million funding round at a $5 billion valuation.】

item.title: 全球最大的退休社区利用小额贷款市场帮助建造更多房屋
item.description: 世界上最大的退休社区正通过近 1.3 亿美元的高收益债务交易进一步扩张。【原文：The largest retirement community in the world is expanding even further with a nearly $130 million high-yield debt deal.】

item.title: 西部联盟发现贷款中不再有违规行为
item.description: Western Alliance Bancorp 在其贷款组合中没有发现更多违规行为，也不希望出现更多与 First Brands 集团倒闭和一家商业房地产投资公司潜在欺诈有关的意外。【原文：Western Alliance Bancorp hasn’t found any more irregularities in its loan portfolio and doesn’t expect more surprises tied to the collapse of First Brands Group and a potential fraud at a commercial real estate investment firm.】

item.title: CPI 延迟公布在即，美元看涨信号浮现
item.description: 本季度伊始，美元走势较为坚挺，有迹象表明，在本周推迟公布的美国消费者价格数据公布之前，交易员们正准备迎接进一步的看涨势头。【原文：The dollar has kicked off the quarter on a firmer note, and there are signs traders are bracing for further bullish momentum before this week’s delayed release of US consumer-price data.】

item.title: T.罗威的目标是在加密货币领域击败一项投资—指数
item.description: T.罗威国际集团（T Rowe Price Group Inc.【原文：T. Rowe Price Group Inc. is planning to launch its first cryptocurrency fund, a bold move for the mutual-fund giant that mostly trades in traditional stocks and bonds.】

item.title: 20 年期国债拍卖需求旺盛，国债保持涨势
item.description: 在 20 年期国债拍卖吸引了强劲需求之后，国债保持了大部分升幅，使长期国债收益率达到了 4 月份以来的最低水平。【原文：Treasuries held most of an advance that sent long-maturity yields to their lowest levels since April after an auction of 20-year bonds drew strong demand.】

item.title: 隐藏贷款丑闻后，塞内加尔 2026 年债务将多付 11
item.description: 预算文件显示，在发现前政府未报告的数十亿美元债务后，塞内加尔 2026 年的偿债支出预计将比之前预测的高出 11%。【原文：Senegal’s 2026 debt-service bill is expected to be 11% steeper than previously forecast after uncovering billions of dollars in unreported liabilities under the former government, budget documents show.】

item.title: 波多黎各公用事业破产重启，董事会成员回归
item.description: 在特朗普政府试图解雇负责管理波多黎各电力公司债务解决方案的监督委员会除一名成员外的所有成员后，波多黎各电力公司的破产工作再次向前推进。【原文：The bankruptcy of Puerto Rico’s power utility is moving forward again following the Trump administration’s attempt to fire all but one member of an oversight board that manages the utility’s debt workout.】

item.title: 查诺斯称，在汽车贷款困境中，Carvana引发 "大量红旗 "事件
item.description: 著名的做空者吉姆-查诺斯（Jim Chanos）说，Carvana Co.引发了 "许多红旗"，尤其是在汽车贷款公司 Tricolor Holdings 最近内爆之后。【原文：Carvana Co. raises “lots of red flags,” especially after the recent implosion of auto lender Tricolor Holdings, says famed short-seller Jim Chanos, who has had a short position in the online car retailer for several years.】

item.title: 亚马逊测试 AR 眼镜，帮助司机找到正确的送货地点
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）正在考虑为其合同送货司机配备增强现实眼镜，以帮助他们找到投递包裹的正确位置。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is considering equipping its contract delivery drivers with augmented-reality glasses that would help them find the right spot to drop a package.】

item.title: 科赫入股后，纽约巨人队成为最有价值的特许经营公司
item.description: 美国国家橄榄球联盟（NFL）周三投票通过了几项价值数十亿美元的交易，创下了体育团队估值的又一纪录。【原文：The NFL voted to approve several deals worth billions of dollars on Wednesday, marking yet another record in sports team valuations.】

item.title: Reddit 因涉嫌数据窃取起诉 Perplexity 等公司
item.description: Reddit Inc.起诉了Perplexity AI Inc.和其他三家公司，指控它们未经许可从该讨论网站获取数据。【原文：Reddit Inc. sued Perplexity AI Inc. and three other companies over alleged data scraping from the discussion site without permission, a sign of the growing demand and value of original data in the burgeoning AI industry.】

item.title: 第六街称，私人信贷将带来更低的回报率
item.description: Sixth Street Partners 联席首席投资官乔希-伊斯特里（Josh Easterly）表示，随着降息预期的增加和信贷息差的收窄，私人信贷投资者应做好未来回报降低的准备。【原文：Private credit investors should be prepared for lower returns in the future with more interest rate cuts expected and credit spreads tightening, according to Sixth Street Partners Co-Chief Investment Officer Josh Easterly.】

item.title: 政治是新地缘政治
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 乌克兰依靠实体安全密钥抵御俄罗斯黑客攻击
item.description: 人工智能是国家防御俄罗斯的一部分。【原文：AI is part of the country's defense against Russia.】

item.title: 米其林下调 2026 年展望，美国经济增长放缓趋势仍将持续
item.description: 米其林认为其在北美的困境将持续到明年，因为这家轮胎制造商警告说，它将无法实现 2026 年的利润目标。【原文：Michelin sees its North American struggles lasting into next year, as the tiremaker warned it won’t hit its profit target for 2026.】

item.title: 与人工智能相关的首次公开募股热潮推动投资者寻求首次公开募股前股票
item.description: 一波成功的首次公开募股浪潮正在推动人们对私营公司的兴趣激增，因为投资者希望在人工智能相关公司进入公开市场之前就能接触到它们。【原文：A wave of successful initial public offerings is driving a surge of interest in private companies, as investors clamor for exposure to artificial intelligence-related firms before they hit public markets.】

item.title: 马克龙之后，法国财政部向国际银行家保证
item.description: 法国财政部长罗兰-莱斯库雷（Roland Lescure）继续开展埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统上个月启动的魅力攻势，强调政府正努力向国际投资者保证，尽管政局动荡，法国仍具有吸引力。【原文：French Finance Minister Roland Lescure continued a charm offensive kicked off by President Emmanuel Macron last month, highlighting the government’s effort to reassure international investors the country is attractive despite political turmoil.】

item.title: 巴西认为企业信贷崩溃是孤立的，而非系统性的
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，巴西政府认为，近期巴西企业信贷市场发生的一连串爆炸事件只是个案，不会构成系统性风险。【原文：Brazil’s government sees the recent spate of blowups in the nation’s corporate credit markets as isolated cases that do not pose a systemic risk, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 巴西石油回合显示出对近海勘探的新兴趣
item.description: 巴西在周三的石油拍卖中将七个区块中的五个卖给了包括巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）和Equinor ASA在内的大型石油公司，这表明尽管油价低迷，但人们对该国南部沿海深海勘探的兴趣仍在恢复。【原文：Brazil sold five of the seven blocks offered in an oil auction on Wednesday to majors including Petrobras and Equinor ASA in a sign of renewed interest to explore in deep waters off the country’s southern coast despite low oil prices.】

item.title: Meta 裁减约 600 个人工智能职位，旨在加快公司发展速度
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc. 将从公司的人工智能部门 Meta Superintelligence Labs 裁员约 600 人，以求在激烈的人工智能竞争中更快地发展。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is cutting approximately 600 jobs from the company’s artificial intelligence unit, Meta Superintelligence Labs, as it aims to move more quickly in the competitive AI race.】

item.title: 超过 1300 万枚 Memecoins 表明监管迫在眉睫
item.description: 安德烈森-霍洛维茨（Andreessen Horowitz）旗下的数字资产风险投资基金 a16z crypto 认为，2025 年超过 1300 万枚梅姆币的发行预示着加密货币的监管真空及其对美国市场结构立法通过的需求。【原文：The issuance of over 13 million individual memecoins in 2025 signals crypto’s regulatory vacuum and its need for US market structure legislation to pass, according to a16z crypto, Andreessen Horowitz’s digital asset venture capital fund.】

item.title: 谷歌推出量子计算突破性产品 Willow 芯片
item.description: Alphabet Inc.旗下的谷歌公司在其 "Willow "量子计算芯片上运行了一种算法，该算法可在类似平台上重复运行，性能优于经典超级计算机，谷歌称这一突破为量子技术在五年内的有用应用扫清了道路。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google ran an algorithm on its “Willow” quantum-computing chip that can be repeated on similar platforms and outperform classical supercomputers, a breakthrough it said clears a path for useful applications of quantum technology within five years.】
